text: ( chayarupa : chandana perera – janadhipathi madhya anshaya )

athadanguwata pathwu sakakaruwan polis athadanguwedi miyayama sambandhayen wana siduwim matha kalaye boho seyin asannata labini.nithimaya kriya margayak thulin danduwam niyama kirima wenuwata mewani awasanawantha siduwim athdakinnata labima manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirimak baw awiwadithaya.shri lankawata manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirim sambandhayen atha digu karana pramukha pele ratak wanuye brithanyayi.eheth mema chayarupayen dakwenne landanhi polis athadanguwedi ha siramandiriyedi jiwithakshayata pathwuwange gnyathin wisin erata agramathyawarayage landan nilaniwasa idiripita pasugiya sathiye dakwu wirodhathawayayi.
